text_block_list.text:
It was a fateful encounter. The weather had been terrible 
since the morning and I was feeling a little melancholic.

After the rain let up, I was strolling around campus 
to stretch my legs after a day of desk work……
Haa, haa, haa……!

Today, most Uma Musume were probably doing indoor 
training. It seemed like she was the first one to 
come to the grounds after the rain had stopped……
Hou……looking good.
――Haaaaaaa!!

She had been running in a light manner as if checking her 
condition. Suddenly that changed and she accelerated rapidly, 
rounding the corner and showing the strength of her legs.

――Huu……wonder if I'm all warmed up? 
Looks like I can keep going♪

Oh, you were watching? Guess I……don't need to 
ask what you thought. Judging by that reaction.

Fufufuu, but, this is nothing compared to during a race. 
For the real thing, I'd be even better!

There was a strong look in her eyes as she said that. She truly 
believed in herself……and that left a dazzling impression.
Well then, see ya――Goodbye!

My intuition screamed 『It has to be her!』. If I were to 
team up with anyone it had to be her. The melancholy had 
cleared. My heart was pounding. This was almost like……

A few days later, after looking in to her with the few 
clues I had, I found out she was participating in 
today's mock race. I took a chance and came to watch……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Good afternoon, trainers! I'm Satono Crown. 
Make sure you get a good look at my running today!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
So she's here, that Satano family Elite Uma Musume. 
There's no doubt she'll be the main character today.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Her mock race results so far have been great. To 
think she's undefeated! A bright personality and full 
of confidence……everything about her is exceptional.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Waaah, you're the center of attention. 
As expected of Kura-chan!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Dia! So you came.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Of course, as someone from the Satono family, 
I couldn't miss Kura-chan's race!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Our dream…… the Satono's long-held wish, 
you're the closest one to it after all Kura-chan.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Dia……thank you. 
I'll definitely debut soon and show you I can win a G1.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Get a good look at me today, okay? 
Once your career starts, it's a path you'll be treading too!

『The Satono Family's long-held wish』……it was well-known in 
racing circles. The Satono family was relatively new, but they 
have already made great contributions to the racing world.

However, there was one thing they had not accomplished. 
『Raising a G1 Uma Musume』

As a result, the Satono Family's long-held wish was 
to produce an Uma Musume that can win G1 races.
――While I was thinking about that, the race started.

Satono Crown looked around from the middle of the pack 
with a relaxed expression on her face. Then, with a 
bold smile, she made her move at the perfect moment.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaーーーー!!

On the final straight, she quickly pulled away, easily 
winning first place. It was a brilliant way to win……!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text:
That was wonderful! Won't you join our team? 
I can bring out more of your talent!
choice_data_list: No, me! Together, for your dream……!
No, me! Together, for your dream……!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
In the past, I was responsible for a Derby Uma Musume. 
Using that experience, I can guide you well……!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
If you're considering going overseas, I have plenty of 
contacts……! We also have the latest training equipment……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Alright, alright. Everyone. Thank you very much! 
But could I have you all calm down a bit?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
For me……in regards to training and race planning, 
I would like to examine each of these carefully.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: My family's desire is resting on this

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
……The Satono group's wish huh……that's true. Even if we 
become the trainer, if we were unable to accomplish that……

Everyone remained quiet, likely intimidated by Satono 
Crown's words. You probably wouldn't be able to support 
her properly with a half-hearted determination.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, everyone, whether you'd be willing to walk 
this path with me, I'd like you all to consider it deeply.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I'll be waiting for someone with that kind of resolve to 
reach out to me! Well then, I'll be excusing myself here――

I wasn't able to speak up, unable to properly make the 
case for myself. But even then, my heart remained unchanged.

At the very least, I wanted to convey my determination 
and thoughts. That was the one thing I had over everyone 
else……! With that in my mind, I followed after her.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Truly……? Really? You're……
choice_data_list: Really. I want to form a contract――
Really. I want to form a contract――

text_block_list.text:
――I passionately spoke about my plans to help her 
get closer to her dream. I surprised myself too, 
I just couldn't stop the words from coming forth……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Huu……I understand your reasoning. 
But the thing that stands out to me most is……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: You're really motivated huh? I don't hate that.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Rather……to break the 『Satono Jinx』, unexpectedly, it just 
might take something illogical like that kind of passion……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, okay. How about we start with a provisional contract? 
Show me what you can do.
choice_data_list: ……! Thank you, looking forward to it!
……! Thank you, looking forward to it!

text_block_list.text:
And so, the days spent struggling to get her approval began! 
However, during our first meeting I was told something unexpected……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
……And so, I'll be really busy helping with my father's 
business soon. For now, we'll have to do some adjustment 
on how long I can spend on training.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I occasionally help out with my father's business 
operations. Once I make my debut I won't have as much 
time, so I want to study as much as I can for now.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I've already created a training plan that I can do in 
my spare time……Here, I'd like you to take a look too.

Now that I think about it……I still don't know much 
about her. I felt that if I didn't come to understand 
her better, I wouldn't be able to support her properly.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Oh, are you interested? Sounds good! 
That'll really help, so please!
